intro:
With a Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack membership, you can access the Nintendo 64™ – Nintendo Classics: MATURE 17+ collection of games. 
 
Take on a top-secret mission that sets off events beyond the imagination in PERFECT DARK™ and brace yourself as humanity is hurling toward its doom in Turok®: Dinosaur Hunter. Play at home or on the go, create suspend points for each game to save your progress, and even play online with voice chat via the Nintendo Switch smartphone app*.

Multiplayer Requirements:
 
• Online: Players must have their own Nintendo Switch system with an active Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack membership.
• Local multiplayer: One Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack active membership and additional accessories (controllers) may be required.
